exercises.description: Apply WAF to solve a real-world problem

sections.background: Web application firewall provides three anti-crawler policies, 1）robot detection by identifying User-Agent, 2）website anti-crawler by checking browser validity, and 3）CC attack protection by limiting the access frequency, to comprehensively mitigate crawler attacks against your websites.

metadata.concept_definition: Web application firewall provides three anti-crawler policies, 1）robot detection by identifying User-Agent, 2）website anti-crawler by checking browser validity, and 3）CC attack protection by limiting the access frequency, to comprehensively mitigate crawler attacks against your websites.
